item.title: Kara No Kyoukai
item.description: Kara no Kyoukai Chapter 1: Fukan Fuukei Kara no Kyoukai Chapter 2: Satsujin Kousatsu (Zen) Kara no Kyoukai Chapter 3: Tsuukaku Zanryuu Kara no Kyoukai Chapter 4: Garan no Dou Kara no Kyoukai Chapter 5: Mujun Rasen Kara no Kyoukai Chapter 6: Boukyaku Rokuon Kara no Kyoukai Chapter 7: Satsujin Kousatsu (Kou) Kara no Kyoukai Chapter 8: Shuushou Kara no Kyoukai: Mirai Fukuin Side Stories Kara no Kyoukai: Mirai Fukuin - Extra Chorus Note : Watching the Main Series is reccomended before watching the side story
